data.lyric:
[ti:Break Up in the End]
[ar:Cole Swindell]
[al:Break Up in the End]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Break Up in the End - Cole Swindell
[00:05.84]Written by：Jon Nite/Jessie Jo Dillon/Chase McGill
[00:11.68]I still walk in that bar a little drunk
[00:15.24]
[00:17.28]I still ask you what you're drinking what's your name
[00:21.14]
[00:23.14]I still kiss you by the shuffleboard last call at 2am
[00:27.65]
[00:28.45]Even though we break up in the end
[00:32.00]
[00:33.89]I'll introduce you to my mom and dad
[00:37.78]
[00:39.58]Say I think I love her when you leave that room
[00:43.52]
[00:45.39]I still might take their advice when I say you're moving in
[00:50.10]
[00:50.69]Even though we break up in the end
[00:54.38]
[00:57.05]Even if I knew you'd be the one that got away
[01:01.53]
[01:03.55]I'd still go back and get you
[01:07.08]
[01:08.24]Even if I knew you'd be my best and worst mistake
[01:12.95]
[01:14.87]Oh I'd still make it with you
[01:18.27]
[01:19.55]Over and over again and again
[01:23.74]
[01:24.29]Even though we break up in the end
[01:28.10]
[01:29.82]I'd still play my favorite song in your car
[01:33.41]
[01:35.28]Let you love me to it 'til it felt like ours
[01:39.28]
[01:41.29]Now all I hear is you in it but I'd still let you ruin it
[01:46.57]Even though we break up in the end
[01:50.33]
[01:52.90]Even if I knew you'd be the one that got away
[01:57.46]
[01:59.43]I'd still go back and get you
[02:02.67]
[02:03.99]Even if I knew you'd be my best and worst mistake
[02:08.77]
[02:10.67]Girl I'd still make it with you
[02:14.10]
[02:15.34]Over and over again and again
[02:19.48]
[02:20.02]Even though we break up in the end
[02:23.97]
[02:45.17]You've just had one too many tonight
[02:48.83]
[02:50.74]You're just calling 'cause you're lonely that's okay
[02:54.52]
[02:56.60]But you know if you come over I cannot let you in
[03:01.33]
[03:01.94]Even though we'll break up in the end
[03:05.77]
[03:07.78]I'd do it over and over again and again
[03:12.51]
[03:13.13]Even though we break up in the end
data.trans:
[ti:Break Up in the End]
[ar:Cole Swindell]
[al:Break Up in the End]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.84]//
[00:11.68]我依旧徘徊在酒吧 略有微醺
[00:15.24]
[00:17.28]我还不停地问着 你在喝什么 你叫什么
[00:21.14]
[00:23.14]在推圆盘游戏边 我亲吻着你 凌晨两点最后的来电
[00:27.65]
[00:28.45]尽管我们已分道扬镳
[00:32.00]
[00:33.89]我会将你介绍给我的爸爸妈妈
[00:37.78]
[00:39.58]大声告诉他们 我爱你 尽管你毅然离开不做停留 
[00:43.52]
[00:45.39]我说你正竭力向前 也许我该听从父母的建议
[00:50.10]
[00:50.69]尽管我们最终以分手告终
[00:54.38]
[00:57.05]尽管我心中明了 你终有一天会离我而去
[01:01.53]
[01:03.55]但我依旧会回到过去 重获你的芳心
[01:07.08]
[01:08.24]尽管我心中明了 爱上你是对亦是错
[01:12.95]
[01:14.87]我依然愿与你携手共度
[01:18.27]
[01:19.55]反反复复 周而复始
[01:23.74]
[01:24.29]尽管我们最终以分手告终
[01:28.10]
[01:29.82]在你车中 我还播放着最爱的歌曲
[01:33.41]
[01:35.28]让你爱上我 感觉好似我们的写照
[01:39.28]
[01:41.29]如今我所听到的便是你沉醉其中 我却让你亲手将其摧毁
[01:46.57]尽管我们最终以分手告终
[01:50.33]
[01:52.90]尽管我心中明了 你终有一天会离我而去
[01:57.46]
[01:59.43]但我依旧会回到过去 重获你的芳心
[02:02.67]
[02:03.99]尽管我心中明了 爱上你是对亦是错
[02:08.77]
[02:10.67]女孩 我依然愿与你携手共度
[02:14.10]
[02:15.34]反反复复 周而复始
[02:19.48]
[02:20.02]尽管我们最终以分手告终
[02:23.97]
[02:45.17]今夜你拥有的太多太多
[02:48.83]
[02:50.74]可你还声声呼喊 只因心中倍感孤寂 那又如何
[02:54.52]
[02:56.60]你深知 即便来访 我亦会将你拒之门外 
[03:01.33]
[03:01.94]尽管我们已分道扬镳
[03:05.77]
[03:07.78]我会反反复复 不停如此
[03:12.51]
[03:13.13]尽管我们最终以分手告终
